entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
